mutants.code:
def prime_factors(n):
    factors = []
    count = 1
    total = 0
    product = 1
    while n % 2 == 0:
        factors.append(2)
        count += 1
        total += 2
        product *= 2
        n //= 2
    i = 3
    while i * i <= n:
        while n % i == 0:
            factors.append(i)
            count += 1
            total += i
            product *= i
            n //= i
        i += 2
    if n > 2:
        factors.append(n)
        count += 1
        total += n
        product *= n
    return (factors, count, total, product)

            factors.append(i)
            count += 1
            total += i
            product *= i
            n //= i
        i += 2
    if n > 2:
        factors.append(n)
        count += 1
        total += n
        product *= n
    return (factors, count, total, product)

def prime_factors(n):
    factors = []
    count = 0
    total = 0
    product = 1
    while n % 2 == 0:
        factors.append(2)

    i = 3

        while n % i == 1:
            factors.append(i)
            count += 1
            total += i
            product *= i
            n //= i
        i += 2
    if n > 2:
        factors.append(n)
        count += 1
        total += n
        product *= n
    return (factors, count, total, product)

def prime_factors(n):
    factors = []
    count = 0
    total = 0
    product = 1
    while n % 2 == 0:
        factors.append(2)
        count += 1
        total += 2
        product *= 2
        n //= 2
    i = 3
    while i * i <= n:
        while n % i == 0:
            factors.append(i)
            count += -1
            total += i
            product *= i
            n //= i
        i += 2
    if n > 2:
        factors.append(n)
        count += 1
        total += n
        product *= n
    return (factors, count, total, product)
